timeline.author: vinagesh
vinagesh

replies.bodyText: That does not exist in the list so I did not test it. Do we support that? amqps_ws is supported though.
replies.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText:
Afaik methods should be supported over both tcp and ws, for mqtt (usually the feature is supported over both protocols, with proxy being the only feature/capability that is restricted to ws).
Which list doesn't mention mqtt_ws? Does it include a comment about the omission maybe?
replies.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: Line 26 is what I went by for testing assuming whoever wrote the test had the full list.
replies.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: It is possible that the sample is just now showing usage of mqtt_ws. We can add it in a subsequent PR to all samples where it is relevant.
replies.author: vinagesh

timeline.author: vinagesh
vinagesh
vinagesh

timeline.bodyText: We should not accidentally check in these values so changed to using env variables
timeline.author: vinagesh

timeline.bodyText: Sample does not work without this
timeline.author: vinagesh

timeline.bodyText: Is this correct though? I see schedule update call next to this line
timeline.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: It is the same method but our sample is using it to cancel. First time we use it to schedule and second time to cancel. Our logs should indicate that and not that we are calling the same function.
replies.author: vinagesh

timeline.bodyText: I didn't get this point - does this refer to the sequence of sending message from service and then setting callback on the device?
timeline.author: abhipsaMisra

replies.bodyText: yes. For MQTT and AMQP, you can run the device sample and then send messages from the portal or wherever you want. However for https, it is not really polling. You need to send the message and then execute receive. If you run this sample and send a message and wait for the message to show up, it will not show up.
replies.author: vinagesh

replies.bodyText: If you think it is a bug, we should discuss.
replies.author: vinagesh
